tool.name: Generate uep outputs (pm-uep-opt)
tool.command: pip show pymuon-suite || ( git clone https://github.com/muon-spectroscopy-computational-project/pymuon-suite /tmp/pymuon-suite && pip install /tmp/pymuon-suite && rm -rf /tmp/pymuon-suite) && unzip $folder && cp $fmt Si.den_fmt && cp $castep Si.castep && out_folder="`python ${__tool_directory__}/../get_out_folder.py`" && python ${__tool_directory__}/torelative.py \$out_folder && bash ${__tool_directory__}/run.sh \$out_folder && zip -r out_zip.zip \$out_folder *_clusters* param.yaml && find \$out_folder > tree.txt
tool.help:
usage: pm-muairss [-h] [-t {r,w}] structures parameter_file
Given an input structure, generates a set of structures with a muon added in a random location.
